extendedInfo.description: Thank You again! Now I have over 400 downloads for my app Quit Smoking. As a thank I put another another funny quit smoking commercial on my app/blog. When I get 500 downloads I will put another funny quit smoking commercial.~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Thank You once again! I have now over 250 installs as another thank I put another funny no smoking ad. When I get 400 installs I will put another funny ad on my app/blog.~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Thank You! I already have over 150 installs now. As a thank you I put a funny no smoking ad. When I get 250 installs I will put another cool thing on my blog as a celebration.~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Sorry for now my app says it's rated 1 star. So don't assume this app is bad. Its just not many people have rated my app so if you want to rate my app please do. I would like you do so I can fix any problems asap. Thank You! This app will help you quit smoking. This app is my bloghttp://whysmokewhy.blogspot.com/This app shows you why you should quit smoking,gives you websites on how to quit smoking,show whats actually in a cigarette,and more!~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Please rate this app. I would like your honest opinion so I can make my app better.~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~You can become a follower of my blog. I would love to have some followers for my blog.~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Check out my group on Facebook called My App Quit Smoking. My group will keep you updated about my app.~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Please rate this app and give your real opinion so I can make this app better.~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~I have add a poll asking if my blog/app viewers if they downloaded my app Quit Smoking yet.

reviews.title: FINALLY
reviews.comment: finally, a guy who cares! Thanks for making this app and maybe people will stop!
reviews.author: Isaac Rubenstein
